meanings.definition: A South Asian dish made with highly seasoned rice and meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked delicious biryanis for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, we always enjoy eating biryanis with our family.
meanings.sent3: The biryanis at the party disappeared within minutes!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the biryanis filled the entire house, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: I can never forget the taste of my grandma's homemade biryanis.
